Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.4 Āsavasāsavaduka, Kusalattika » 4.4.2 Akusalapada » 4.4.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavasāsavaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
38.
1659Āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva sāsavassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
39.
1660Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1661Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1662Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1663(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup4.4.3 Abyākatapada >>
